# rchelperfunctions

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of rchelperfunctions is to provide reusable functions for creating tables and some additional utility functions. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of rchelperfunctions from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("rosovconsulting/rchelperfunctions")
```

## Demonstration

```{r setup}
library(rchelperfunctions)
library(janitor)

```


```{r col_map}
col_map <- create_column_map(rchabits)

```
```{r age}
age_table <- rchabits |> 
  tabyl(q1, show_na = FALSE) |> 
  adorn_totals() |>
  table_style("Age")
```

```{r include=FALSE}
## need webshot2 intalled to build .md
gt::gtsave(age_table, "man/figures/age-table.png")

```

```{r include graphic age, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("man/figures/age-table.png")
```

```{r cuisine}
cuisine_table <- multi_response_table(rchabits, expss::mdset_p("q6_\\d")) |>
     multi_response_table_style("Types of Cuisine")
```

```{r include=FALSE}
## need webshot2 intalled to build .md
gt::gtsave(cuisine_table, "man/figures/cuisine-table.png")

```

```{r include graphic cuisine, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("man/figures/cuisine-table.png")
```


```{r habits}
habits_table <- rchabits |>
    dplyr::select(tidyselect::starts_with("q3_")) |>
    likert_table() |>
    likert_table_style("Habits") |>
    gt::sub_missing(missing_text = "No answer")
```

```{r include=FALSE}
## need webshot2 intalled to build .md
gt::gtsave(habits_table, "man/figures/habits-table.png")

```

```{r include graphic habits, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("man/figures/habits-table.png")
```

```{r cuisine x age}
cuisine_by_age_table <- rchabits |>
     dplyr::select(q1, tidyselect::starts_with("q3_")) |>
     likert_table(cross = q1) |>
     likert_table_style("Cuisine X Age")
```

```{r include=FALSE}
## need webshot2 intalled to build .md
gt::gtsave(cuisine_by_age_table, "man/figures/cuisine-by-age-table.png")

```

```{r include graphic cuisine x age, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("man/figures/cuisine-by-age-table.png")
```
